question:
क्या print होगा?
[CODE] { \ @x = "Madhuri"@,@ \ x = 15@,@ \ print(x)@,@ \ }[STOPCODE]\ OUTPUT:
\ [BLANK]

क्या print होगा?
[CODE] { \ @x = "Python"@,@ \ y = "is"@,@ \ z = "awesome"@,@ \ print(x, y, z)@,@ \ }[STOPCODE]\ OUTPUT:
\ [BLANK]

क्या print होगा?
[CODE] { \ @x = "Python"@,@ \ y = "is"@,@ \ z = "awesome"@,@ \ print(x + y + z)@,@ \ }[STOPCODE]\ OUTPUT:
\ [BLANK]

क्या print होगा?
[CODE] { \ @price = 20@,@ \ txt = f"Biscuit ka daam ₹{price} hai."@,@ \ print(txt)@,@ \ }[STOPCODE]\ OUTPUT:
\ Biscuit ka daam ₹[BLANK] hai.

options: Ek darjan ball-pen ka daam ₹60 hai.
